channel.title: Buddleja davidii on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Buddleja davidii on funPlantGenes

item.title: BdCCD4.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BdCCD4.2 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 4 Genome: Species: Buddleja davidii Functional Descriptions: Both BdCCD4 genes are highly expressed during flower development and transcripts levels parallel the accumulation of crocins in the petals.
